actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to implement immediately the program authorizing emergency mortgage relief payments under the Emergency Homeowners Relief Act.

summary.text: Emergency Homeowners Relief Act Amendments - Directs the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to implement immediately the program authorizing emergency mortgage relief payments under the Emergency Homeowners Relief Act.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to implement immediately the program authorizing emergency mortgage relief payments under the Emergency Homeowners Relief Act.
